1: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>old</n> שָׁנָ֖ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> שָׁא֣וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Saul</n> בְּמָלְכ֑וֹ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>reigned</n> וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>two</n> שָׁנִ֔ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> מָלַ֖ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>and when he had reigned</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>over Israel</n>
2: וַיִּבְחַר־ <sup>977 </sup> <n>chose</n> ל֨וֹ שָׁא֜וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Saul</n> שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <sup>7969 </sup> <n>him three</n> אֲלָפִים֮ <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל֒ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>[men] of Israel</n> וַיִּהְי֨וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>were with</n> שָׁא֜וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>were with Saul</n> אַלְפַּ֗יִם <sup>505 </sup> <n>[whereof] two thousand</n> בְּמִכְמָשׂ֙ <sup>4363 </sup> <n>in Michmash</n> וּבְהַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>and in mount</n> בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <sup>1008 </sup> <n>Bethel</n> וְאֶ֗לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>and a thousand</n> הָיוּ֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>were with</n> י֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <sup>3129 </sup> <n>were with Jonathan</n> בְּגִבְעַ֖ת <sup>1390 </sup> <n>in Gibeah</n> בִּנְיָמִ֑ין <sup>1144 </sup> <n>of Benjamin</n> וְיֶ֣תֶר <sup>3499 </sup> <n>and the rest</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> שִׁלַּ֖ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>he sent</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <sup>168 </sup> <n>to his tent</n>
3: וַיַּ֣ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smote</n> יוֹנָתָ֗ן <sup>3129 </sup> <n>And Jonathan</n> אֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> נְצִ֤יב <sup>5333 </sup> <n>the garrison</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>that was</n> בְּגֶ֔בַע <sup>1387 </sup> <n>that [was] in Geba</n> וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>and the Philistines</n> וְשָׁאוּל֩ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>[of it] And Saul</n> תָּקַ֨ע <sup>8628 </sup> <n>blew</n> בַּשּׁוֹפָ֤ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>the trumpet</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>throughout</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>throughout all the land</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>hear</n> הָעִבְרִֽים׃ <sup>5680 </sup> <n>Let the Hebrews</n>
4: וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֞ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>And all Israel</n> שָׁמְע֣וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> הִכָּ֤ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>had smitten</n> שָׁאוּל֙ <sup>7586 </sup> <n>[that] Saul</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נְצִ֣יב <sup>5333 </sup> <n>a garrison</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>and also</n> נִבְאַשׁ <sup>887 </sup> <n>also was had in abomination</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and [that] Israel</n> בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>with the Philistines</n> וַיִּצָּעֲק֥וּ <sup>6817 </sup> <n>were called together</n> הָעָ֛ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And the people</n> אַחֲרֵ֥י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> שָׁא֖וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Saul</n> הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <sup>1537 </sup> <n>to Gilgal</n>
5: וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֞ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>And the Philistines</n> נֶאֶסְפ֣וּ ׀ <sup>622 </sup> <n>gathered themselves together</n> לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>to fight</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>with Israel</n> שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>thirty</n> אֶ֤לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> רֶ֙כֶב֙ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>chariots</n> וְשֵׁ֤שֶׁת <sup>8337 </sup> <n>and six</n> אֲלָפִים֙ <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> פָּרָשִׁ֔ים <sup>6571 </sup> <n>horsemen</n> וְעָ֕ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and people</n> כַּח֛וֹל <sup>2344 </sup> <n>as the sand</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> שְׂפַֽת־ <sup>8193 </sup> <n>shore</n> הַיָּ֖ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>which [is] on the sea</n> לָרֹ֑ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>in multitude</n> וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and they came up</n> וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <sup>2583 </sup> <n>and pitched</n> בְמִכְמָ֔שׂ <sup>4363 </sup> <n>in Michmash</n> קִדְמַ֖ת <sup>6926 </sup> <n>eastward</n> בֵּ֥ית אָֽוֶן׃ <sup>1007 </sup> <n>from Bethaven</n>
6: וְאִ֨ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>When the men</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> רָאוּ֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> צַר־ <sup>6862 </sup> <n>A strait</n> ל֔וֹ כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נִגַּ֖שׂ <sup>5065 </sup> <n>were distressed</n> הָעָ֑ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>(for the people</n> וַיִּֽתְחַבְּא֣וּ <sup>2244 </sup> <n>did hide</n> הָעָ֗ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>) then the people</n> בַּמְּעָר֤וֹת <sup>4631 </sup> <n>themselves in caves</n> וּבַֽחֲוָחִים֙ <sup>2336 </sup> <n>thickets</n> וּבַסְּלָעִ֔ים <sup>5553 </sup> <n>and in rocks</n> וּבַצְּרִחִ֖ים <sup>6877 </sup> <n>and in high places</n> וּבַבֹּרֽוֹת׃ <sup>953 </sup> <n>and in pits</n>

9: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> שָׁא֔וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And Saul</n> הַגִּ֣שׁוּ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>Bring hither</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> הָעֹלָ֖ה <sup>5930 </sup> <n>a burnt offering</n> וְהַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <sup>8002 </sup> <n>to me and peace offerings</n> וַיַּ֖עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>And he offered</n> הָעֹלָֽה׃ <sup>5930 </sup> <n>the burnt offering</n>

And Saul</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> רָאִיתִי֩ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Because I saw</n> כִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> נָפַ֨ץ <sup>5310 </sup> <n>were scattered</n> הָעָ֜ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>that the people</n> מֵעָלַ֗י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וְאַתָּה֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> בָ֙אתָ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>from me and [that] thou camest</n> לְמוֹעֵ֣ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>appointed</n> הַיָּמִ֔ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>not within the days</n> וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>and [that] the Philistines</n> נֶאֱסָפִ֥ים <sup>622 </sup> <n>gathered themselves together</n> מִכְמָֽשׂ׃ <sup>4363 </sup> <n>at Michmash</n>

13: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <sup>8050 </sup> <n>And Samuel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> שָׁא֖וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>to Saul</n> נִסְכָּ֑לְתָּ <sup>5528 </sup> <n>Thou hast done foolishly</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> שָׁמַ֗רְתָּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>thou hast not kept</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִצְוַ֞ת <sup>4687 </sup> <n>the commandment</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> צִוָּ֔ךְ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>which he commanded</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> הֵכִ֨ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>have established</n> יְהוָ֧ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>thee for now would the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַֽמְלַכְתְּךָ֛ <sup>4467 </sup> <n>thy kingdom</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>upon Israel</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>for</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>ever</n>

15: וַיָּ֣קָם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>arose</n> שְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <sup>8050 </sup> <n>And Samuel</n> וַיַּ֛עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and gat him up</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <sup>1537 </sup> <n>from Gilgal</n> גִּבְעַ֣ת <sup>1390 </sup> <n>unto Gibeah</n> בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>of Benjamin</n> וַיִּפְקֹ֣ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>numbered</n> שָׁא֗וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And Saul</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> הַנִּמְצְאִ֣ים <sup>4672 </sup> <n>[that were] present</n> עִמּ֔וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>about</n> כְּשֵׁ֥שׁ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>with him about six</n> מֵא֖וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> אִֽישׁ׃ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n>

17: וַיֵּצֵ֧א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>came out</n> הַמַּשְׁחִ֛ית <sup>7843 </sup> <n>And the spoilers</n> מִמַּחֲנֵ֥ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of the camp</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <sup>7969 </sup> <n>in three</n> רָאשִׁ֑ים <sup>7218 </sup> <n>companies</n> הָרֹ֨אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>company</n> אֶחָ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>one</n> יִפְנֶ֛ה <sup>6437 </sup> <n>turned</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>unto</n> דֶּ֥רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>unto the way</n> עָפְרָ֖ה <sup>6084 </sup> <n>[that leadeth to] Ophrah</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>unto the land</n> שׁוּעָֽל׃ <sup>7777 </sup> <n>of Shual</n>
18: וְהָרֹ֤אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>company</n> אֶחָד֙ <sup>259 </sup> <n>And another</n> יִפְנֶ֔ה <sup>6437 </sup> <n>turned</n> דֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>the way</n> בֵּ֣ית חֹר֑וֹן <sup>1032 </sup> <n>[to] Bethhoron</n> וְהָרֹ֨אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>company</n> אֶחָ֤ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>and another</n> יִפְנֶה֙ <sup>6437 </sup> <n>turned</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>[to] the way</n> הַגְּב֔וּל <sup>1366 </sup> <n>of the border</n> הַנִּשְׁקָ֛ף <sup>8259 </sup> <n>that looketh</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> גֵּ֥י <sup>1516 </sup> <n>to the valley</n> הַצְּבֹעִ֖ים <sup>6650 </sup> <n>of Zeboim</n> הַמִּדְבָּֽרָה׃ <sup>4057 </sup> <n>toward the wilderness</n> ס
19: וְחָרָשׁ֙ <sup>2796 </sup> <n>Now there was no smith</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>now no</n> יִמָּצֵ֔א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>found</n> בְּכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>throughout all the land</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> [אָמַר כ] (אָמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>answer</n> ק) פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>for the Philistines</n> פֶּ֚ן <sup>6435 </sup> <n>Otherwise</n> יַעֲשׂ֣וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>make</n> הָעִבְרִ֔ים <sup>5680 </sup> <n>Lest the Hebrews</n> חֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>[them] swords</n> א֥וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> חֲנִֽית׃ <sup>2595 </sup> <n>or spears</n>
20: וַיֵּרְד֥וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>went down</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>But all the Israelites</n> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>to the Philistines</n> לִ֠לְטוֹשׁ <sup>3913 </sup> <n>to sharpen</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַחֲרַשְׁתּ֤וֹ <sup>4282 </sup> <n>his share</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֵתוֹ֙ <sup>855 </sup> <n>and his coulter</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> קַרְדֻּמּ֔וֹ <sup>7134 </sup> <n>and his axe</n> וְאֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> מַחֲרֵשָׁתֽוֹ׃ <sup>4281 </sup> <n>and his mattock</n>
21: וְֽהָיְתָ֞ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הַפְּצִ֣ירָה <sup>6477 </sup> <n>the charge</n> פִ֗ים <sup>6310 </sup> <n>according</n> לַמַּֽחֲרֵשֹׁת֙ <sup>4281 </sup> <n>for the mattocks</n> וְלָ֣אֵתִ֔ים <sup>855 </sup> <n>and for the coulters</n> וְלִשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>three</n> קִלְּשׁ֖וֹן <sup>7053 </sup> <n>fork</n> וּלְהַקַּרְדֻּמִּ֑ים <sup>7134 </sup> <n>and for the axes</n> וּלְהַצִּ֖יב <sup>5324 </sup> <n>and to sharpen</n> הַדָּרְבָֽן׃ <sup>1861 </sup> <n>the goads</n>
22: וְהָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>So it came to pass in the day</n> מִלְחֶ֔מֶת <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of battle</n> וְלֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>neither</n> נִמְצָ֜א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>found</n> חֶ֤רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>that there was neither sword</n> וַחֲנִית֙ <sup>2595 </sup> <n>nor spear</n> בְּיַ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in the hand</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of any</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of any of the people</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> שָׁא֖וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>that [were] with Saul</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יוֹנָתָ֑ן <sup>3129 </sup> <n>and Jonathan</n> וַתִּמָּצֵ֣א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>was there found</n> לְשָׁא֔וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>but with Saul</n> וּלְיוֹנָתָ֖ן <sup>3129 </sup> <n>and with Jonathan</n> בְּנֽוֹ׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>his son</n>
